name: Lovemessages
0:
”Alexa, open Love messages”
”Alexa, start Love messages”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: love messages
des:
When you want to show true spiritual love to a significant other, use this skill. When using the skill, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next quote. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill. These messages are from the book, "Dearest Palmetta" available as hard copy or digital and available on Amazon. This book is a romantic love story told by my grandfather, Rufus Jefferson Matlock, in 165 love letters to my grandmother, Palmetta, during their courtship.
Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
